import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { Row, Col, Button, Container } from "reactstrap"; const Welcome = styled.h3` text-align: center; padding: 1rem; background-color: #fff000; color: red; `; const Statistic = styled.input` text-align: center; `; const PersonPage = ( { backHome, currPlayer } ) => { const [newheight, setNewHeight] = React.useState(currPlayer.height ? currPlayer.height : 0); const [newweight, setNewWeight] = React.useState(currPlayer.height ? currPlayer.height : 0); const [newbirthday, setNewBirthday] = React.useState(currPlayer.birthday ? currPlayer.birthday : ""); const [newlocation, setNewLocation] = React.useState(currPlayer.primLocation ? currPlayer.primLocation : ""); return (
Welcome {currPlayer.name}
); } export default PersonPage;
